bonuses.name: Adventurer
bonuses.desc: Max HP increased by 1000.

bonuses.name: Adventurer
bonuses.desc: Opening a chest regenerates 30% Max HP over 5s.

pieces.name: Adventurer's Golden Goblet
pieces.desc: The spoils of one of an adventurer's many expeditions. Though a little damaged, it is still an excellent find.

pieces.name: Adventurer's Tail Feather
pieces.desc: The feather of an exotic bird rarely seen on this continent.

pieces.name: Adventurer's Bandana
pieces.desc: A cloth garment worn at the forehead. Though soaked in sweat and covered in dust, it still beams with an adventurer's pride.

pieces.name: Adventurer's Flower
pieces.desc: A resilient flower that survived the harsh environment of an ancient city. It is now proudly worn like a medal.

pieces.name: Adventurer's Pocket Watch
pieces.desc: It's easy to lose track of time when you're adventuring where the sun doesn't shine, whether that's the depths of the abyss or the ruins of a lost city.

pieces.name: Adventurer's Golden Goblet

bonuses.name: Lucky Dog
bonuses.desc: DEF increased by 100.

bonuses.name: Lucky Dog
bonuses.desc: Picking up Mora restores 300 HP.

pieces.name: Lucky Dog's Goblet
pieces.desc: An exquisite metallic vessel that was once used to knock out a thief.

pieces.name: Lucky Dog's Eagle Feather
pieces.desc: A monster once cornered an adventurer, but was then picked off by a hunting eagle... That eagle dropped this feather, which now carries some of the adventurer's good luck.

pieces.name: Lucky Dog's Silver Circlet
pieces.desc: Its former owner once fell into a cave and found the treasure trove of an exiled royal. This is a souvenir from that incident.

pieces.name: Lucky Dog's Clover
pieces.desc: A four-leaf clover that grows in the wild. It was picked because it is said to bring good luck.

pieces.name: Lucky Dog's Hourglass
pieces.desc: A broken hourglass from which all the sand has escaped. But it's fine, because the passage of time means nothing to someone without a single worry in the whole world.

pieces.name: Lucky Dog's Goblet
pieces.desc: An exquisite metallic vessel that was once used to knock out a thief.

pieces.name: Lucky Dog's Eagle Feather

bonuses.name: Traveling Doctor
bonuses.desc: Increases incoming healing by 20%.

bonuses.name: Traveling Doctor
bonuses.desc: Using Elemental Burst restores 20% HP.

pieces.name: Traveling Doctor's Medicine Pot
pieces.desc: This pot used to carry concentrated and extremely potent concoctions. It is now empty, but still gives off a strong smell of medicine.

pieces.name: Traveling Doctor's Owl Feather
pieces.desc: The durable feather of an owl. Emblematic of nocturnal supremacy, it gave some encouragement to the Traveling Doctor when venturing out to visit patients late at night.

pieces.name: Traveling Doctor's Handkerchief
pieces.desc: Used to tie back the doctor's hair when treating patients. Can also be used as a sling for sprains and broken arms in emergencies.

pieces.name: Traveling Doctor's Silver Lotus
pieces.desc: A precious medicinal ingredient that has lost all medicinal value after years in storage.

pieces.name: Traveling Doctor's Pocket Watch
pieces.desc: A precise instrument used for keeping time. For a doctor, every second counts.

pieces.name: Traveling Doctor's Medicine Pot
pieces.desc: This pot used to carry concentrated and extremely potent concoctions. It is now empty, but still gives off a strong smell of medicine.

pieces.name: Traveling Doctor's Owl Feather

pieces.desc: A precious medicinal ingredient that has lost all medicinal value after years in storage.

pieces.name: Traveling Doctor's Pocket Watch
pieces.desc: A precise instrument used for keeping time. For a doctor, every second counts.

bonuses.name: Resolution of Sojourner
bonuses.desc: Increases Charged Attack CRIT Rate by 30%.

pieces.name: Goblet of the Sojourner
pieces.desc: A plain porcelain goblet that was once brimming with joyous brews.

pieces.name: Feather of Homecoming
pieces.desc: A blue arrow fletching imbued with the sentiment of travelers that had once faded into the horizon.

pieces.name: Crown of Parting
pieces.desc: A reed coronet that emanates the spring breeze.

pieces.name: Heart of Comradeship
pieces.desc: A small cerulean flower with somebody's ribbon pinned to the stem.

pieces.name: Sundial of the Sojourner
pieces.desc: A sundial that has survived the ages, always silently recording the cycles of the sun and moon as they pass through the sky.

pieces.name: Goblet of the Sojourner
pieces.desc: A plain porcelain goblet that was once brimming with joyous brews.

pieces.name: Feather of Homecoming
pieces.desc: A blue arrow fletching imbued with the sentiment of travelers that had once faded into the horizon.

pieces.name: Crown of Parting
pieces.desc: A reed coronet that emanates the spring breeze.

pieces.name: Heart of Comradeship
pieces.desc: A small cerulean flower with somebody's ribbon pinned to the stem.

pieces.name: Sundial of the Sojourner
pieces.desc: A sundial that has survived the ages, always silently recording the cycles of the sun and moon as they pass through the sky.

bonuses.name: Tiny Miracle
bonuses.desc: All Elemental RES increased by 20%.

bonuses.name: Tiny Miracle
bonuses.desc: Incoming elemental DMG increases corresponding Elemental RES by 30% for 10s. Can only occur once every 10s.

pieces.name: Tiny Miracle's Goblet
pieces.desc: A cup commonly used for fortune-telling. It can also hold water, of course.

pieces.name: Tiny Miracle's Feather
pieces.desc: A feather from a bird of prey that flies almost too fast for the human eye to detect.

pieces.name: Tiny Miracle's Earrings
pieces.desc: A cheap accessory that is actually made from ancient meteoric ore.

pieces.name: Tiny Miracle's Flower
pieces.desc: A flower that grew from a rock, breaking through the stone as it strove to reach the light.

pieces.name: Tiny Miracle's Hourglass
pieces.desc: Just an ordinary, everyday hourglass. Turn it upside down and sure enough, the dry sand starts trickling down like water.

pieces.name: Tiny Miracle's Goblet
pieces.desc: A cup commonly used for fortune-telling. It can also hold water, of course.

pieces.name: Tiny Miracle's Feather
pieces.desc: A feather from a bird of prey that flies almost too fast for the human eye to detect.

pieces.name: Tiny Miracle's Earrings
pieces.desc: A cheap accessory that is actually made from ancient meteoric ore.

pieces.name: Tiny Miracle's Hourglass
pieces.desc: Just an ordinary, everyday hourglass. Turn it upside down and sure enough, the dry sand starts trickling down like water.

bonuses.name: Berserker
bonuses.desc: CRIT Rate +12%

bonuses.name: Berserker
bonuses.desc: When HP is below 70%, CRIT Rate increases by an additional 24%.

pieces.name: Berserker's Bone Goblet
pieces.desc: A goblet made from the bone of an unknown beast. It was taken as a trophy after some deadly encounter.

pieces.name: Berserker's Indigo Feather
pieces.desc: An indigo feather from a legendary raven, part of which has been dyed crimson red.

pieces.name: Berserker's Battle Mask
pieces.desc: A hideous iron mask that has been left half-shattered from vicious battles.

pieces.name: Berserker's Rose
pieces.desc: An exquisite flower that has been dyed red. It represents the qualities of the Berserker.

pieces.name: Berserker's Timepiece
pieces.desc: An instrument with an eternal flow that continues mercilessly within, reminding the Berserker of the limited time he has left — both on the battlefield as well as in the world.

pieces.name: Berserker's Bone Goblet
pieces.desc: A goblet made from the bone of an unknown beast. It was taken as a trophy after some deadly encounter.

pieces.name: Berserker's Indigo Feather
pieces.desc: An indigo feather from a legendary raven, part of which has been dyed crimson red.

pieces.name: Berserker's Battle Mask
pieces.desc: A hideous iron mask that has been left half-shattered from vicious battles.

pieces.name: Berserker's Rose
pieces.desc: An exquisite flower that has been dyed red. It represents the qualities of the Berserker.

pieces.name: Berserker's Timepiece
pieces.desc: An instrument with an eternal flow that continues mercilessly within, reminding the Berserker of the limited time he has left — both on the battlefield as well as in the world.

bonuses.name: Instructor
bonuses.desc: Increases Elemental Mastery by 80.

bonuses.name: Instructor
bonuses.desc: Upon triggering an Elemental Reaction, increases all party members' Elemental Mastery by 120 for 8s.

pieces.name: Instructor's Tea Cup
pieces.desc: It may seem like an ordinary tea cup to most. But to students, it is the symbol of the instructor's authority.

pieces.name: Instructor's Feather Accessory
pieces.desc: Any instructor who has mastered the art of de-escalation knows to keep this accessory firmly in their grasp at all times.

pieces.name: Instructor's Cap
pieces.desc: A standard-issue honorary instructor's cap, only granted to those who turn down a promotion.

pieces.name: Instructor's Brooch
pieces.desc: Whenever the instructor wore this brooch, it meant there would be no training sessions that day.

pieces.name: Instructor's Pocket Watch
pieces.desc: A stopwatch used not for general timekeeping but to measure the duration of a training session.

pieces.name: Instructor's Tea Cup
pieces.desc: It may seem like an ordinary tea cup to most. But to students, it is the symbol of the instructor's authority.

pieces.name: Instructor's Feather Accessory
pieces.desc: Any instructor who has mastered the art of de-escalation knows to keep this accessory firmly in their grasp at all times.

pieces.name: Instructor's Pocket Watch
pieces.desc: A stopwatch used not for general timekeeping but to measure the duration of a training session.

bonuses.name: The Exile
bonuses.desc: Energy Recharge +20%

bonuses.name: The Exile
bonuses.desc: Using an Elemental Burst regenerates 2 Energy for all party members (excluding the wearer) every 2s for 6s. This effect cannot stack.

pieces.name: Exile's Goblet
pieces.desc: A dull goblet made of a heavy metal. It was once inlaid with gemstones, but they have since been stripped off.

pieces.name: Exile's Feather
pieces.desc: Not an actual accessory per se. Just a random bird feather that was found somewhere in the wilderness by the exile.

pieces.name: Exile's Circlet
pieces.desc: A prestigious circlet. However, the royal insignia has been scratched out, and it is no longer the symbol of distinguished status that it once was.

pieces.name: Exile's Flower
pieces.desc: A withered flower worn on the shirt. Its former owner insisted on wearing it even in exile, so it must mean something.

pieces.name: Exile's Pocket Watch
pieces.desc: Even after the crystal watch face was shattered and the hands lost, its former owner kept it until the end.

pieces.name: Exile's Goblet
pieces.desc: A dull goblet made of a heavy metal. It was once inlaid with gemstones, but they have since been stripped off.

pieces.name: Exile's Feather
pieces.desc: Not an actual accessory per se. Just a random bird feather that was found somewhere in the wilderness by the exile.

pieces.name: Exile's Circlet
pieces.desc: A prestigious circlet. However, the royal insignia has been scratched out, and it is no longer the symbol of distinguished status that it once was.

pieces.name: Exile's Flower
pieces.desc: A withered flower worn on the shirt. Its former owner insisted on wearing it even in exile, so it must mean something.

pieces.name: Exile's Pocket Watch
pieces.desc: Even after the crystal watch face was shattered and the hands lost, its former owner kept it until the end.

bonuses.name: Defender's Will
bonuses.desc: DEF +30%

bonuses.name: Defender's Will
bonuses.desc: For each different element present in your own party, the wearer's Elemental RES to that corresponding element is increased by 30%.

pieces.name: Guardian's Vessel
pieces.desc: A metal vessel that can be filled with a drink to dispel the loneliness of the long watch.

pieces.name: Guardian's Sigil
pieces.desc: A feather-shaped brooch that symbolizes someone’s yearning to defend others like a shield.

pieces.name: Guardian's Band
pieces.desc: A fabric band dyed indigo by the darkness of night. Can also double as a bandage in the event of an emergency.

pieces.name: Guardian's Flower
pieces.desc: An iris that was cherished by the guardian. Unfortunately, the chance never came for it to be given to whom the guardian loved.

pieces.name: Guardian's Clock
pieces.desc: A small timekeeping gadget. On moonless nights, it was the only way its former owner could know the time.

pieces.name: Guardian's Vessel
pieces.desc: A metal vessel that can be filled with a drink to dispel the loneliness of the long watch.

pieces.name: Guardian's Sigil
pieces.desc: A feather-shaped brooch that symbolizes someone’s yearning to defend others like a shield.

pieces.name: Guardian's Band

pieces.name: Guardian's Clock
pieces.desc: A small timekeeping gadget. On moonless nights, it was the only way its former owner could know the time.

bonuses.name: Brave Heart
bonuses.desc: Increases DMG by 30% against opponents with more than 50% HP.

pieces.name: Outset of the Brave
pieces.desc: A crude wooden vessel filled only with memories.

pieces.name: Prospect of the Brave
pieces.desc: A shimmering feather from a songbird that brings a nudge of courage to its wearer.

pieces.name: Crown of the Brave
pieces.desc: A rough-and-ready laurel wreath that seems as precious as a king's golden crown.

pieces.name: Medal of the Brave
pieces.desc: A simple flower brooch that is a keepsake from someone's first adventure.

pieces.name: Fortitude of the Brave
pieces.desc: A dated miniature hourglass that serves no practical purpose. It seems as elusive as time itself.

pieces.name: Outset of the Brave
pieces.desc: A crude wooden vessel filled only with memories.

pieces.name: Medal of the Brave

pieces.name: Fortitude of the Brave
pieces.desc: A dated miniature hourglass that serves no practical purpose. It seems as elusive as time itself.

bonuses.name: Martial Artist
bonuses.desc: Increases Normal Attack and Charged Attack DMG by 15%.

bonuses.name: Martial Artist
bonuses.desc: After using Elemental Skill, increases Normal Attack and Charged Attack DMG by 25% for 8s.

pieces.name: Martial Artist's Wine Cup
pieces.desc: A rather exquisite wine cup used in pre-combat rituals.

pieces.name: Martial Artist's Feather Accessory
pieces.desc: A common bird feather. Experts use it to practice strength control, while rookies use it to make fans.

pieces.name: Martial Artist's Bandana
pieces.desc: The first lesson as an apprentice: Vigor, Strength, Will. These words are written on the bandana so you'll never forget them.

pieces.name: Martial Artist's Red Flower
pieces.desc: This particular kind of red flower was the only thing that could alleviate the Martial Artist's pain.

pieces.name: Martial Artist's Water Hourglass
pieces.desc: A tool to keep track of time in endurance training. It is more accurate and reliable than a regular hourglass.

pieces.name: Martial Artist's Wine Cup
pieces.desc: A rather exquisite wine cup used in pre-combat rituals.

pieces.name: Martial Artist's Feather Accessory
pieces.desc: A common bird feather. Experts use it to practice strength control, while rookies use it to make fans.

pieces.name: Martial Artist's Bandana
pieces.desc: The first lesson as an apprentice: Vigor, Strength, Will. These words are written on the bandana so you'll never forget them.

pieces.name: Martial Artist's Red Flower
pieces.desc: This particular kind of red flower was the only thing that could alleviate the Martial Artist's pain.

pieces.name: Martial Artist's Water Hourglass
pieces.desc: A tool to keep track of time in endurance training. It is more accurate and reliable than a regular hourglass.

bonuses.name: Gambler
bonuses.desc: Increases Elemental Skill DMG by 20%.

bonuses.name: Gambler
bonuses.desc: Defeating an opponent has a 100% chance to remove Elemental Skill CD. Can only occur once every 15s.

pieces.name: Gambler's Dice Cup
pieces.desc: This vessel was specially made for a single purpose. It has absolutely no secret compartments built into it.

pieces.name: Gambler's Feather Accessory
pieces.desc: The tail feather of a large bird. Perfect for discretely concealing a trump card.

pieces.name: Gambler's Earrings
pieces.desc: A pair of blue earrings that, when worn, calm the mind and encourage a rational assessment of risks.

pieces.name: Gambler's Brooch
pieces.desc: A big, luxurious flower that can hide loaded dice.

pieces.name: Gambler's Pocket Watch
pieces.desc: A shattered pocket watch that once took a lethal hit for its owner.

pieces.name: Gambler's Dice Cup
pieces.desc: This vessel was specially made for a single purpose. It has absolutely no secret compartments built into it.

pieces.name: Gambler's Feather Accessory
pieces.desc: The tail feather of a large bird. Perfect for discretely concealing a trump card.

pieces.name: Gambler's Earrings
pieces.desc: A pair of blue earrings that, when worn, calm the mind and encourage a rational assessment of risks.

pieces.name: Gambler's Brooch
pieces.desc: A big, luxurious flower that can hide loaded dice.

pieces.name: Gambler's Pocket Watch
pieces.desc: A shattered pocket watch that once took a lethal hit for its owner.

bonuses.name: Scholar
bonuses.desc: Energy Recharge +20%

bonuses.name: Scholar
bonuses.desc: Gaining Elemental Particles or Orbs gives 3 Energy to all party members who have a bow or a catalyst equipped. Can only occur once every 3s.

pieces.name: Scholar's Ink Cup
pieces.desc: Originally designed to hold drinking water, this cup was stained black after a scholar used it to wash their paint brushes.

pieces.name: Scholar's Quill Pen
pieces.desc: A bird's feather that serves as a quill pen. The tip has long been stained black.

pieces.name: Scholar's Lens
pieces.desc: This corrective lens helped restore the vision of one whose eyes were damaged from intensive studying.

pieces.name: Scholar's Bookmark
pieces.desc: A dried flower used as a bookmark. It has absorbed the scent from the pages.

pieces.name: Scholar's Clock
pieces.desc: A small desktop clock, whose former owner was a scholar sat in a windowless room buried in books. This was probably the only reference they had to the time of day.

pieces.name: Scholar's Ink Cup
pieces.desc: Originally designed to hold drinking water, this cup was stained black after a scholar used it to wash their paint brushes.

pieces.name: Scholar's Quill Pen
pieces.desc: A bird's feather that serves as a quill pen. The tip has long been stained black.

pieces.name: Scholar's Lens
pieces.desc: This corrective lens helped restore the vision of one whose eyes were damaged from intensive studying.

pieces.name: Scholar's Bookmark
pieces.desc: A dried flower used as a bookmark. It has absorbed the scent from the pages.

pieces.name: Scholar's Clock
pieces.desc: A small desktop clock, whose former owner was a scholar sat in a windowless room buried in books. This was probably the only reference they had to the time of day.

bonuses.name: Prayers for Illumination
bonuses.desc: Affected by Pyro for 40% less time.

pieces.name: Tiara of Flame
pieces.desc: A tiara worn by those tasked with offering sacrifices in ancient times. After being subjected to the dancing sacrificial flames year in and year out, it possesses remarkable resistance.

pieces.name: Tiara of Flame
pieces.desc: A tiara worn by those tasked with offering sacrifices in ancient times. After being subjected to the dancing sacrificial flames year in and year out, it possesses remarkable resistance.

bonuses.name: Prayers for Destiny
bonuses.desc: Affected by Hydro for 40% less time.

pieces.name: Tiara of Torrents
pieces.desc: A tiara worn by those tasked with offering sacrifices in ancient times. Because it was submerged in water year in and year out, it possesses remarkable resistance.

pieces.name: Tiara of Torrents
pieces.desc: A tiara worn by those tasked with offering sacrifices in ancient times. Because it was submerged in water year in and year out, it possesses remarkable resistance.

bonuses.name: Prayers for Wisdom
bonuses.desc: Affected by Electro for 40% less time.

pieces.name: Tiara of Thunder
pieces.desc: A tiara worn by those tasked with offering sacrifices in ancient times. Because it harkened to the call of thunder year in and year out, it possesses remarkable resistance.

pieces.name: Tiara of Thunder
pieces.desc: A tiara worn by those tasked with offering sacrifices in ancient times. Because it harkened to the call of thunder year in and year out, it possesses remarkable resistance.

bonuses.name: Prayers to Springtime
bonuses.desc: Affected by Cryo for 40% less time.

pieces.name: Tiara of Frost
pieces.desc: A tiara worn by those tasked with offering sacrifices in ancient times. Because it once weathered years of the icy cold, it possesses remarkable resistance.

pieces.name: Tiara of Frost
pieces.desc: A tiara worn by those tasked with offering sacrifices in ancient times. Because it once weathered years of the icy cold, it possesses remarkable resistance.

bonuses.name: Blizzard Strayer
bonuses.desc: Cryo DMG Bonus +15%

bonuses.name: Blizzard Strayer
bonuses.desc: When a character attacks an opponent affected by Cryo, their CRIT Rate is increased by 20%. If the opponent is Frozen, CRIT Rate is increased by an additional 20%.

pieces.name: Frost-Weaved Dignity
pieces.desc: A cup carved out of ice that is as chilly and biting as winter. Its former master would drink an unfreezable liquor from it.

pieces.name: Icebreaker's Resolve
pieces.desc: A feather that exudes a chilly aura. One can almost feel the turbulent winds that brought it here, wailing over snow-covered plains and between frosty peaks.

pieces.name: Broken Rime's Echo
pieces.desc: The crown of an ancient hero who dreamt of conquering the cold. It is proof of its former master's bravery in facing the bone-chilling cold of winter.

pieces.name: Snowswept Memory
pieces.desc: A long-extinct flower, covered in beads of frost, that once grew on the glaciers. There was a time when even the proudest and most arrogant warriors bowed before it.

pieces.name: Frozen Homeland's Demise
pieces.desc: A timepiece from a nation of old that waited for their warriors' return. What flows inside is not sand, but bits of ice that never melt.

pieces.name: Frost-Weaved Dignity
pieces.desc: A cup carved out of ice that is as chilly and biting as winter. Its former master would drink an unfreezable liquor from it.

bonuses.name: Thundersoother
bonuses.desc: Electro RES increased by 40%.

bonuses.name: Thundersoother
bonuses.desc: Increases DMG against opponents affected by Electro by 35%.

pieces.name: Thundersoother's Goblet
pieces.desc: The wine goblet from which the Thundersoother, who defeated the Beast of Thunder, once drank violet lightning.

pieces.name: Thundersoother's Plume
pieces.desc: The feather of a predatory bird that soars through lightning storms. It was said to have been adopted as an insignia by the legendary hero who pacified thunder and lightning.

pieces.name: Thundersoother's Diadem
pieces.desc: The crown given to the Thundersoother for defeating the Beast of Thunder that had been wreaking havoc upon the land.

pieces.name: Thundersoother's Heart
pieces.desc: A flower that blooms even amidst ferocious thunder and lightning. To this day, it still grants courage to travelers in thunderstorms.

pieces.name: Hour of Soothing Thunder
pieces.desc: A timepiece kept by the hero who conquered thunder and lightning. The tiny shards of Electro crystal within flow back and forth with the passing of time.

pieces.name: Thundersoother's Goblet
pieces.desc: The wine goblet from which the Thundersoother, who defeated the Beast of Thunder, once drank violet lightning.

pieces.name: Thundersoother's Plume
pieces.desc: The feather of a predatory bird that soars through lightning storms. It was said to have been adopted as an insignia by the legendary hero who pacified thunder and lightning.

pieces.name: Thundersoother's Diadem
pieces.desc: The crown given to the Thundersoother for defeating the Beast of Thunder that had been wreaking havoc upon the land.

pieces.name: Thundersoother's Heart
pieces.desc: A flower that blooms even amidst ferocious thunder and lightning. To this day, it still grants courage to travelers in thunderstorms.

pieces.name: Hour of Soothing Thunder
pieces.desc: A timepiece kept by the hero who conquered thunder and lightning. The tiny shards of Electro crystal within flow back and forth with the passing of time.

bonuses.name: Lavawalker
bonuses.desc: Pyro RES increased by 40%.

bonuses.name: Lavawalker
bonuses.desc: Increases DMG against opponents affected by Pyro by 35%.

pieces.name: Lavawalker's Epiphany
pieces.desc: A legendary goblet that can withstand extremely high temperatures. It still retains a degree of warmth even though it is now empty.

pieces.name: Lavawalker's Salvation
pieces.desc: The feather of a proud phoenix. You can almost hear the sound of its wings flapping in the scorching flames.

pieces.name: Lavawalker's Wisdom
pieces.desc: The circlet of a sage who traversed a sea of fire. It once shone brightly from their ancient silhouette as they stood strong amidst the flames.

pieces.name: Lavawalker's Resolution
pieces.desc: A flower that blooms amidst burning flames. It is said that long ago, a sage once wore it as he walked into a sea of fire.

pieces.name: Lavawalker's Torment
pieces.desc: Burning sand flows within this hourglass. Despite the intense heat, the sand leave no mark upon the vessel that houses it.

pieces.name: Lavawalker's Epiphany
pieces.desc: A legendary goblet that can withstand extremely high temperatures. It still retains a degree of warmth even though it is now empty.

pieces.name: Lavawalker's Salvation
pieces.desc: The feather of a proud phoenix. You can almost hear the sound of its wings flapping in the scorching flames.

pieces.name: Lavawalker's Wisdom
pieces.desc: The circlet of a sage who traversed a sea of fire. It once shone brightly from their ancient silhouette as they stood strong amidst the flames.

pieces.name: Lavawalker's Resolution

pieces.name: Lavawalker's Torment
pieces.desc: Burning sand flows within this hourglass. Despite the intense heat, the sand leave no mark upon the vessel that houses it.

bonuses.name: Maiden Beloved
bonuses.desc: Character Healing Effectiveness +15%

bonuses.name: Maiden Beloved
bonuses.desc: Using an Elemental Skill or Burst increases healing received by all party members by 20% for 10s.

pieces.name: Maiden's Fleeting Leisure
pieces.desc: A vessel made with sweet black tea in mind rather than bitter liquor.

pieces.name: Maiden's Heart-Stricken Infatuation
pieces.desc: A feathered accessory that carries the longing for a certain someone, like a migratory bird on the wind.

pieces.name: Maiden's Fading Beauty
pieces.desc: A meticulously well-maintained woman's hat that keeps wrinkles safely out of sight.

pieces.name: Maiden's Distant Love
pieces.desc: A fragrant flower that will bloom for all eternity and never wither.

pieces.name: Maiden's Passing Youth
pieces.desc: The hands of time will never come to an end, but the same cannot not be said for those cherished years of the young maiden's life when she was doted upon.

pieces.name: Maiden's Fleeting Leisure
pieces.desc: A vessel made with sweet black tea in mind rather than bitter liquor.

pieces.name: Maiden's Heart-Stricken Infatuation
pieces.desc: A feathered accessory that carries the longing for a certain someone, like a migratory bird on the wind.

pieces.name: Maiden's Fading Beauty
pieces.desc: A meticulously well-maintained woman's hat that keeps wrinkles safely out of sight.

pieces.name: Maiden's Distant Love
pieces.desc: A fragrant flower that will bloom for all eternity and never wither.

pieces.name: Maiden's Passing Youth
pieces.desc: The hands of time will never come to an end, but the same cannot not be said for those cherished years of the young maiden's life when she was doted upon.

bonuses.name: Gladiator's Finale
bonuses.desc: If the wielder of this artifact set uses a Sword, Claymore or Polearm, increases their Normal Attack DMG by 35%.

pieces.name: Gladiator's Intoxication
pieces.desc: The golden cup a champion gladiator drank from in ancient times. It brimmed with his glory for years until the fateful day of his fall.

pieces.name: Gladiator's Destiny
pieces.desc: A feather of dreams that soars free like an eagle. At the end of the gladiator's legendary life, this parting gift was left upon his chest by a bird that knew true freedom.

pieces.name: Gladiator's Triumphus
pieces.desc: The helmet of a legendary gladiator from ancient times, who would proudly stretch out his bloodied arms to welcome the thunderous applause of his audience.

pieces.name: Gladiator's Nostalgia
pieces.desc: No one knows why the legendary gladiator wore this flower on his chest. It was the brutal warrior's only weakness.

pieces.name: Gladiator's Longing
pieces.desc: A timepiece that recorded the gladiator's days in the bloodstained Colosseum. To him, it counted down the days on his long road to freedom.

pieces.name: Gladiator's Intoxication
pieces.desc: The golden cup a champion gladiator drank from in ancient times. It brimmed with his glory for years until the fateful day of his fall.

pieces.name: Gladiator's Destiny
pieces.desc: A feather of dreams that soars free like an eagle. At the end of the gladiator's legendary life, this parting gift was left upon his chest by a bird that knew true freedom.

pieces.name: Gladiator's Triumphus
pieces.desc: The helmet of a legendary gladiator from ancient times, who would proudly stretch out his bloodied arms to welcome the thunderous applause of his audience.

pieces.name: Gladiator's Longing
pieces.desc: A timepiece that recorded the gladiator's days in the bloodstained Colosseum. To him, it counted down the days on his long road to freedom.

bonuses.name: Viridescent Venerer
bonuses.desc: Anemo DMG Bonus +15%

bonuses.name: Viridescent Venerer
bonuses.desc: Increases Swirl DMG by 60%. Decreases opponent's Elemental RES to the element infused in the Swirl by 40% for 10s.

pieces.name: Viridescent Venerer's Vessel
pieces.desc: A water pouch used by the Viridescent Venerer. Its capacity is much greater than one would expect.

pieces.name: Viridescent Arrow Feather
pieces.desc: The fletching of an arrow that once pierced right through its prey, but somehow still remains spotless.

pieces.name: Viridescent Venerer's Diadem
pieces.desc: A proud crown that once belonged to the Viridescent Venerer. It is as lush and green as the breezes of the wild.

pieces.name: In Remembrance of Viridescent Fields
pieces.desc: A wild flower that was once a ubiquitous sight in its homeland. It was picked by a hunter who wore it on their chest.

pieces.name: Viridescent Venerer's Determination
pieces.desc: A wondrous instrument that a hunter once wore. It forever points towards their prey.

pieces.name: Viridescent Venerer's Vessel
pieces.desc: A water pouch used by the Viridescent Venerer. Its capacity is much greater than one would expect.

pieces.name: Viridescent Arrow Feather
pieces.desc: The fletching of an arrow that once pierced right through its prey, but somehow still remains spotless.

pieces.name: Viridescent Venerer's Diadem
pieces.desc: A proud crown that once belonged to the Viridescent Venerer. It is as lush and green as the breezes of the wild.

pieces.name: In Remembrance of Viridescent Fields
pieces.desc: A wild flower that was once a ubiquitous sight in its homeland. It was picked by a hunter who wore it on their chest.

pieces.name: Viridescent Venerer's Determination
pieces.desc: A wondrous instrument that a hunter once wore. It forever points towards their prey.

bonuses.name: Wanderer's Troupe
bonuses.desc: Increases Elemental Mastery by 80.

bonuses.name: Wanderer's Troupe
bonuses.desc: Increases Charged Attack DMG by 35% if the character uses a Catalyst or a Bow.

pieces.name: Wanderer's String-Kettle
pieces.desc: An ancient, strangely-shaped canteen. The interior is fitted with harp strings, which play a wondrous tune as the water flows out.

pieces.name: Bard's Arrow Feather
pieces.desc: An azure arrow fletching that has neither faded nor splintered with the passage of time. The sound of running water seems to linger around it.

pieces.name: Conductor's Top Hat
pieces.desc: A top hat that has managed to retain its radiance despite braving the elements for time untold. An ancient tune still resonates within.

pieces.name: Troupe's Dawnlight
pieces.desc: A small flower-shaped insignia. If you listen carefully, you can almost hear a flute playing and voices singing.

pieces.name: Concert's Final Hour
pieces.desc: An hourglass used to keep time during a band performance. It once made a crisp sound, but their performance has since ended.

pieces.name: Wanderer's String-Kettle
pieces.desc: An ancient, strangely-shaped canteen. The interior is fitted with harp strings, which play a wondrous tune as the water flows out.

pieces.name: Bard's Arrow Feather
pieces.desc: An azure arrow fletching that has neither faded nor splintered with the passage of time. The sound of running water seems to linger around it.

pieces.name: Conductor's Top Hat
pieces.desc: A top hat that has managed to retain its radiance despite braving the elements for time untold. An ancient tune still resonates within.

pieces.name: Troupe's Dawnlight
pieces.desc: A small flower-shaped insignia. If you listen carefully, you can almost hear a flute playing and voices singing.

pieces.name: Concert's Final Hour
pieces.desc: An hourglass used to keep time during a band performance. It once made a crisp sound, but their performance has since ended.

bonuses.name: Thundering Fury
bonuses.desc: Electro DMG Bonus +15%

bonuses.name: Thundering Fury
bonuses.desc: Increases damage caused by Overloaded, Electro-Charged and Superconduct by 40%. Triggering such effects decreases Elemental Skill CD by 1s. Can only occur once every 0.8s.

pieces.name: Omen of Thunderstorm
pieces.desc: A ceremonial cup that holds the blood of the innocent. It is brimming with the thundering fury of the prayers that echo within.

pieces.name: Survivor of Catastrophe
pieces.desc: A lightning-charged feather that still flickers with the wrath of the Thunderbird's cruel retribution.

pieces.name: Thunder Summoner's Crown
pieces.desc: A crown once worn by an ancient shaman who worshiped the Thunderbird. The capricious beast remained unmoved by the shaman's devotion.

pieces.name: Thunderbird's Mercy
pieces.desc: A lightning-infused flower, somehow spared the fate of being trodden underfoot or reduced to ash by the furious purple fire, making it the sole survivor on the day of disaster.

pieces.name: Hourglass of Thunder
pieces.desc: The hourglass used to foretell the coming of the Thunderbird by the tribe that worshiped it. It has fallen into eternal silence now that the tribe is no more.

pieces.name: Omen of Thunderstorm
pieces.desc: A ceremonial cup that holds the blood of the innocent. It is brimming with the thundering fury of the prayers that echo within.

pieces.name: Survivor of Catastrophe
pieces.desc: A lightning-charged feather that still flickers with the wrath of the Thunderbird's cruel retribution.

pieces.name: Thunder Summoner's Crown
pieces.desc: A crown once worn by an ancient shaman who worshiped the Thunderbird. The capricious beast remained unmoved by the shaman's devotion.

pieces.name: Hourglass of Thunder
pieces.desc: The hourglass used to foretell the coming of the Thunderbird by the tribe that worshiped it. It has fallen into eternal silence now that the tribe is no more.

bonuses.name: Crimson Witch of Flames
bonuses.desc: Pyro DMG Bonus +15%

bonuses.name: Crimson Witch of Flames
bonuses.desc: Increases Overloaded and Burning DMG by 40%. Increases Vaporize and Melt DMG by 15%. Using Elemental Skill increases the 2-Piece Set Bonus by 50% of its starting value for 10s. Max 3 stacks.

pieces.name: Witch's Heart Flames
pieces.desc: A flame-spitting urn left behind by the Crimson Witch of Flames, who once dreamt of burning away all the demons in the world. The fire in the urn burns eternally, as did its former master.

pieces.name: Witch's Ever-Burning Plume
pieces.desc: A bird feather touched by the witch who once dreamt of burning away all the demons in the world. Its eternal flame burns hot.

pieces.name: Witch's Scorching Hat
pieces.desc: A hat once worn by the witch who dreamt of burning away all of the demons in the world. The large brim blocked her sight.

pieces.name: Witch's Flower of Blaze
pieces.desc: A flower touched by the witch who once dreamt of burning away all the demons in the world. The anonymous flames affectionately caress the hands of those who touch it.

pieces.name: Witch's End Time
pieces.desc: A timepiece worn by the witch who dreamt of burning away all the demons in the world. The years the witch dedicated to the flames flow within.

pieces.name: Witch's Heart Flames
pieces.desc: A flame-spitting urn left behind by the Crimson Witch of Flames, who once dreamt of burning away all the demons in the world. The fire in the urn burns eternally, as did its former master.

pieces.name: Witch's Ever-Burning Plume
pieces.desc: A bird feather touched by the witch who once dreamt of burning away all the demons in the world. Its eternal flame burns hot.

pieces.name: Witch's Scorching Hat
pieces.desc: A hat once worn by the witch who dreamt of burning away all of the demons in the world. The large brim blocked her sight.

pieces.name: Witch's Flower of Blaze
pieces.desc: A flower touched by the witch who once dreamt of burning away all the demons in the world. The anonymous flames affectionately caress the hands of those who touch it.

pieces.name: Witch's End Time
pieces.desc: A timepiece worn by the witch who dreamt of burning away all the demons in the world. The years the witch dedicated to the flames flow within.

bonuses.name: Noblesse Oblige
bonuses.desc: Elemental Burst DMG +20%

bonuses.name: Noblesse Oblige
bonuses.desc: Using an Elemental Burst increases all party members' ATK by 20% for 12s. This effect cannot stack.

pieces.name: Royal Silver Urn
pieces.desc: An ornamental urn that once belonged to the old aristocrats of Mondstadt. Mournful winds seem to echo within its empty interior.

pieces.name: Royal Plume
pieces.desc: A feathered hat accessory worn by the old aristocrats of Mondstadt on hunts. It still stands proudly as if no time has passed.

pieces.name: Royal Masque
pieces.desc: A masquerade mask worn by the old aristocrats of Mondstadt. Its hollow eyes are fixated on the golden days of the past.

pieces.name: Royal Flora
pieces.desc: A satin flower with a glossy finish, fit for an elegant gathering. It still looks as distinguished as it did on the day it was cast aside.

pieces.name: Royal Pocket Watch
pieces.desc: A pocket watch that once belonged to the old aristocrats of Mondstadt. Passed down from generation to generation, it has witnessed many years of history.

pieces.name: Royal Silver Urn
pieces.desc: An ornamental urn that once belonged to the old aristocrats of Mondstadt. Mournful winds seem to echo within its empty interior.

pieces.name: Royal Plume
pieces.desc: A feathered hat accessory worn by the old aristocrats of Mondstadt on hunts. It still stands proudly as if no time has passed.

pieces.name: Royal Masque
pieces.desc: A masquerade mask worn by the old aristocrats of Mondstadt. Its hollow eyes are fixated on the golden days of the past.

pieces.name: Royal Flora
pieces.desc: A satin flower with a glossy finish, fit for an elegant gathering. It still looks as distinguished as it did on the day it was cast aside.

pieces.name: Royal Pocket Watch
pieces.desc: A pocket watch that once belonged to the old aristocrats of Mondstadt. Passed down from generation to generation, it has witnessed many years of history.

bonuses.name: Bloodstained Chivalry
bonuses.desc: Physical DMG +25%

bonuses.name: Bloodstained Chivalry
bonuses.desc: After defeating an opponent, increases Charged Attack DMG by 50%, and reduces its Stamina cost to 0 for 10s.

pieces.name: Bloodstained Chevalier's Goblet
pieces.desc: The dark metallic vessel owned by the Bloodstained Knight. Its exterior has been stained as black as the night by smoke and coagulated blood.

pieces.name: Bloodstained Black Plume
pieces.desc: A raven feather pinned to a knight's cape. Countless bloodstains have dyed it pitch black.

pieces.name: Bloodstained Iron Mask
pieces.desc: The iron mask the knight used to conceal their identity. Many have speculated about the face behind the mask.

pieces.name: Bloodstained Flower of Iron
pieces.desc: A dried flower stained black with blood and now as hard as steel. Probably some sort of a memento for its former master.

pieces.name: Bloodstained Final Hour
pieces.desc: A timepiece once used by a knight. The liquid inside has dried up, rendering it useless.

pieces.name: Bloodstained Chevalier's Goblet
pieces.desc: The dark metallic vessel owned by the Bloodstained Knight. Its exterior has been stained as black as the night by smoke and coagulated blood.

pieces.name: Bloodstained Black Plume
pieces.desc: A raven feather pinned to a knight's cape. Countless bloodstains have dyed it pitch black.

pieces.name: Bloodstained Iron Mask
pieces.desc: The iron mask the knight used to conceal their identity. Many have speculated about the face behind the mask.

pieces.name: Bloodstained Flower of Iron
pieces.desc: A dried flower stained black with blood and now as hard as steel. Probably some sort of a memento for its former master.

pieces.name: Bloodstained Final Hour
pieces.desc: A timepiece once used by a knight. The liquid inside has dried up, rendering it useless.

bonuses.name: Archaic Petra
bonuses.desc: Gain a 15% Geo DMG Bonus.

bonuses.name: Archaic Petra
bonuses.desc: Upon obtaining an Elemental Shard created through a Crystallize Reaction, all party members gain a 35% DMG Bonus for that particular element for 10s. Only one form of Elemental DMG Bonus can be gained in this manner at any one time.

pieces.name: Goblet of Chiseled Crag
pieces.desc: A resplendent yet dignified wine goblet, once filled to the brim in an era long gone.

pieces.name: Feather of Jagged Peaks
pieces.desc: A hard feather from a large seacliff hawk. The basalt tip of the feather sometimes glistens with a cool dew.

pieces.name: Mask of Solitude Basalt
pieces.desc: A solemn mask exquisitely carved from basalt. Its hollow eyes stare ahead expressionless and cold.

pieces.name: Flower of Creviced Cliff
pieces.desc: A flower born of the minerals and rocks of cliffside cracks. The way its petals blow in the wind makes it seem alive.

pieces.name: Sundial of Enduring Jade
pieces.desc: A sundial carved from a single, large piece of jade. Its lined with a pattern that silently records the passage of time.

pieces.name: Goblet of Chiseled Crag

pieces.name: Feather of Jagged Peaks

pieces.name: Sundial of Enduring Jade
pieces.desc: A sundial carved from a single, large piece of jade. Its lined with a pattern that silently records the passage of time.

bonuses.name: Retracing Bolide
bonuses.desc: Increases Shield Strength by 35%.

bonuses.name: Retracing Bolide
bonuses.desc: While protected by a shield, gain an additional 40% Normal and Charged Attack DMG.

pieces.name: Summer Night's Waterballoon
pieces.desc: Water balloons can be seen everywhere during the summer festival, but none are as finely-wrought as this one.

pieces.name: Summer Night's Finale
pieces.desc: A well-crafted wooden dart. It will only stop once it has reached its destination.

pieces.name: Summer Night's Mask
pieces.desc: A popular mask cast in the image of a deity, as described in the legends.

pieces.name: Summer Night's Bloom
pieces.desc: A man-made flower in eternal bloom. Who knows if there truly is life in there?

pieces.name: Summer Night's Moment
pieces.desc: A pocketwatch that has stopped at a certain point in time.

pieces.name: Summer Night's Waterballoon
pieces.desc: Water balloons can be seen everywhere during the summer festival, but none are as finely-wrought as this one.

pieces.name: Summer Night's Finale
pieces.desc: A well-crafted wooden dart. It will only stop once it has reached its destination.

pieces.name: Summer Night's Mask

pieces.name: Summer Night's Bloom
pieces.desc: A man-made flower in eternal bloom. Who knows if there truly is life in there?

pieces.name: Summer Night's Moment
pieces.desc: A pocketwatch that has stopped at a certain point in time.

bonuses.name: Heart of Depth
bonuses.desc: Hydro DMG Bonus +15%

bonuses.name: Heart of Depth
bonuses.desc: After using Elemental Skill, increases Normal Attack and Charged Attack DMG by 30% for 15s.

pieces.name: Goblet of Thundering Deep
pieces.desc: A faded wine cup that was unintentionally dredged up from the sea. Its dull exterior tells of the days it has spent beneath the waves.

pieces.name: Gust of Nostalgia
pieces.desc: A feather carried over by whimpering sea winds and crimson waves. The passage of time has changed its shape and color.

pieces.name: Wine-Stained Tricorne
pieces.desc: An ancient, wine-stained sea hat that still reeks of alcohol even now.

pieces.name: Gilded Corsage
pieces.desc: A mantle brooch that has lost its luster. The gold plating that once adorned it was ground away by the wind and the waves long ago.

pieces.name: Copper Compass
pieces.desc: An ancient bronze compass. Its needle points towards some ever-distant shore, to a non-existent harbor.

pieces.name: Goblet of Thundering Deep
pieces.desc: A faded wine cup that was unintentionally dredged up from the sea. Its dull exterior tells of the days it has spent beneath the waves.

pieces.name: Gust of Nostalgia
pieces.desc: A feather carried over by whimpering sea winds and crimson waves. The passage of time has changed its shape and color.

pieces.name: Wine-Stained Tricorne
pieces.desc: An ancient, wine-stained sea hat that still reeks of alcohol even now.

pieces.name: Gilded Corsage
pieces.desc: A mantle brooch that has lost its luster. The gold plating that once adorned it was ground away by the wind and the waves long ago.

pieces.name: Copper Compass
pieces.desc: An ancient bronze compass. Its needle points towards some ever-distant shore, to a non-existent harbor.

bonuses.name: Tenacity of the Millelith
bonuses.desc: HP increased by 20%.

bonuses.name: Tenacity of the Millelith
bonuses.desc: When an Elemental Skill hits an opponent, the ATK of all nearby party members is increased by 20% and their Shield Strength is increased by 30% for 3s. This effect can be triggered once every 0.5s. This effect can still be triggered even when the character who is using this artifact set is not on the field.

pieces.name: Noble's Pledging Vessel
pieces.desc: A golden cup used by the Millelith to take their oaths. Still bears the lovely scent of wine.

pieces.name: Ceremonial War-Plume
pieces.desc: A falcon feather worn on ceremonial occasions. It displays the dignity and resolve of Liyue Harbor to the outside world.

pieces.name: General's Ancient Helm
pieces.desc: A splendorous helmet from ages past. Clean the dust away and it will look brand-new once more.

pieces.name: Flower of Accolades
pieces.desc: A flower made from gold leaf. It represents the glories and honors attained by its wearer.

pieces.name: Orichalceous Time-Dial
pieces.desc: A simple device for telling time. This was once standard-issue for the Millelith during times of war.

pieces.name: Noble's Pledging Vessel
pieces.desc: A golden cup used by the Millelith to take their oaths. Still bears the lovely scent of wine.

pieces.name: Ceremonial War-Plume
pieces.desc: A falcon feather worn on ceremonial occasions. It displays the dignity and resolve of Liyue Harbor to the outside world.

pieces.name: General's Ancient Helm
pieces.desc: A splendorous helmet from ages past. Clean the dust away and it will look brand-new once more.

pieces.name: Flower of Accolades
pieces.desc: A flower made from gold leaf. It represents the glories and honors attained by its wearer.

pieces.name: Orichalceous Time-Dial
pieces.desc: A simple device for telling time. This was once standard-issue for the Millelith during times of war.

bonuses.name: Pale Flame
bonuses.desc: Physical DMG is increased by 25%.

bonuses.name: Pale Flame
bonuses.desc: When an Elemental Skill hits an opponent, ATK is increased by 9% for 7s. This effect stacks up to 2 times and can be triggered once every 0.3s. Once 2 stacks are reached, the 2-set effect is increased by 100%.

pieces.name: Surpassing Cup
pieces.desc: An intricately-made cup. Its appearance betrays nothing of its age to an observer.

pieces.name: Wise Doctor's Pinion
pieces.desc: An ominous pinion with edges of unsurpassed keenness. Perhaps it represents an unnaturally uninhibited nature.

pieces.name: Mocking Mask
pieces.desc: A mask that covers the face, hiding one's expression from others.

pieces.name: Stainless Bloom
pieces.desc: A hard, blue artificial flower. Its petals shall never wither, nor shall its colors fade.

pieces.name: Moment of Cessation
pieces.desc: A pocket watch with a cover that cannot be opened. Yet it ticks and tocks away, following the inexorable flow of time.

pieces.name: Surpassing Cup
pieces.desc: An intricately-made cup. Its appearance betrays nothing of its age to an observer.

pieces.name: Wise Doctor's Pinion
pieces.desc: An ominous pinion with edges of unsurpassed keenness. Perhaps it represents an unnaturally uninhibited nature.

pieces.name: Mocking Mask

pieces.name: Stainless Bloom

pieces.name: Moment of Cessation
pieces.desc: A pocket watch with a cover that cannot be opened. Yet it ticks and tocks away, following the inexorable flow of time.

bonuses.name: Shimenawa's Reminiscence
bonuses.desc: When casting an Elemental Skill, if the character has 15 or more Energy, they lose 15 Energy and Normal/Charged/Plunging Attack DMG is increased by 50% for 10s. This effect will not trigger again during that duration.

pieces.name: Hopeful Heart
pieces.desc: A special fortune-telling cylindrical object. The mechanism at the bottom allows one to easily remove all unwanted wish sticks.

pieces.name: Shaft of Remembrance
pieces.desc: A demon-slaying arrow of a rather ancient make. It seems to have been preserved with great care by someone, even until the present day.

pieces.name: Capricious Visage
pieces.desc: A well-preserved ceremonial fox mask. A small, enigmatic smile ever graces its lips.

pieces.name: Entangling Bloom
pieces.desc: A lovely amulet made from twisted paper cord. It is said to hold the power to make wishes come true.

pieces.name: Morning Dew's Moment
pieces.desc: A bronze pocket watch adorned with twisted paper cord and a bell. Its hands are forever frozen at the dawn of a certain autumn day.

pieces.name: Hopeful Heart
pieces.desc: A special fortune-telling cylindrical object. The mechanism at the bottom allows one to easily remove all unwanted wish sticks.

pieces.name: Shaft of Remembrance
pieces.desc: A demon-slaying arrow of a rather ancient make. It seems to have been preserved with great care by someone, even until the present day.

pieces.name: Capricious Visage
pieces.desc: A well-preserved ceremonial fox mask. A small, enigmatic smile ever graces its lips.

pieces.name: Morning Dew's Moment
pieces.desc: A bronze pocket watch adorned with twisted paper cord and a bell. Its hands are forever frozen at the dawn of a certain autumn day.

bonuses.name: Emblem of Severed Fate
bonuses.desc: Energy Recharge +20%

bonuses.name: Emblem of Severed Fate
bonuses.desc: Increases Elemental Burst DMG by 25% of Energy Recharge. A maximum of 75% bonus DMG can be obtained in this way.

pieces.name: Scarlet Vessel
pieces.desc: An intricately-designed wine vessel that a world-famous martial artist once drank from.

pieces.name: Sundered Feather
pieces.desc: This was once the black feather of a certain tengu warrior, and was the treasured souvenir of an ancient swordsman.

pieces.name: Ornate Kabuto
pieces.desc: A sturdy and hard helmet worn as armor by a noble samurai.

pieces.name: Magnificent Tsuba
pieces.desc: Legends hold that this ornate hand guard was once fitted upon a sword gifted to the oni who betrayed the Shogun.

pieces.name: Storm Cage
pieces.desc: An exquisite seal cage patterned with pansies painted upon a black backdrop, decorated with shining inlaid seashells and intricate gold-work.

pieces.name: Scarlet Vessel
pieces.desc: An intricately-designed wine vessel that a world-famous martial artist once drank from.

pieces.name: Sundered Feather
pieces.desc: This was once the black feather of a certain tengu warrior, and was the treasured souvenir of an ancient swordsman.

pieces.name: Ornate Kabuto
pieces.desc: A sturdy and hard helmet worn as armor by a noble samurai.

pieces.name: Magnificent Tsuba
pieces.desc: Legends hold that this ornate hand guard was once fitted upon a sword gifted to the oni who betrayed the Shogun.

pieces.name: Storm Cage
pieces.desc: An exquisite seal cage patterned with pansies painted upon a black backdrop, decorated with shining inlaid seashells and intricate gold-work.

bonuses.name: Husk of Opulent Dreams
bonuses.desc: DEF +30%

bonuses.name: Husk of Opulent Dreams
bonuses.desc: A character equipped with this Artifact set will obtain the Curiosity effect in the following conditions: When on the field, the character gains 1 stack after hitting an opponent with a Geo attack, triggering a maximum of once every 0.3s. When off the field, the character gains 1 stack every 3s. Curiosity can stack up to 4 times, each providing 6% DEF and a 6% Geo DMG Bonus. When 6 seconds pass without gaining a Curiosity stack, 1 stack is lost.

pieces.name: Calabash of Awakening
pieces.desc: A gourd that has been adorned with powdered gold and black paint. Its original color can no longer be discerned, but its main use seems to be as a performance prop.

pieces.name: Plume of Luxury
pieces.desc: A feather-shaped token that was brought forth from a secluded hall. The compassion of its creator led to it being left within that mansion along with a certain slumbering form.

pieces.name: Skeletal Hat
pieces.desc: A hat that once shielded a wanderer from sun and rain. It eventually became a convenient tool with which faces might be hidden and expressions obscured.

pieces.name: Bloom Times
pieces.desc: A small golden ornament with six petals that shall never wilt. It symbolizes the transience of mortal glories.

pieces.name: Song of Life
pieces.desc: As far as Inazuma is concerned, this is some small object from overseas. The heart of this mechanism has been removed, and its hands no longer turn.

pieces.name: Calabash of Awakening

pieces.name: Plume of Luxury
pieces.desc: A feather-shaped token that was brought forth from a secluded hall. The compassion of its creator led to it being left within that mansion along with a certain slumbering form.

pieces.name: Skeletal Hat
pieces.desc: A hat that once shielded a wanderer from sun and rain. It eventually became a convenient tool with which faces might be hidden and expressions obscured.

pieces.name: Bloom Times
pieces.desc: A small golden ornament with six petals that shall never wilt. It symbolizes the transience of mortal glories.

pieces.name: Song of Life
pieces.desc: As far as Inazuma is concerned, this is some small object from overseas. The heart of this mechanism has been removed, and its hands no longer turn.

bonuses.name: Ocean-Hued Clam
bonuses.desc: Healing Bonus +15%.

bonuses.name: Ocean-Hued Clam
bonuses.desc: When the character equipping this artifact set heals a character in the party, a Sea-Dyed Foam will appear for 3 seconds, accumulating the amount of HP recovered from healing (including overflow healing). At the end of the duration, the Sea-Dyed Foam will explode, dealing DMG to nearby opponents based on 90% of the accumulated healing. (This DMG is calculated similarly to Reactions such as Electro-Charged, and Superconduct, but is not affected by Elemental Mastery, Character Levels, or Reaction DMG Bonuses). Only one Sea-Dyed Foam can be produced every 3.5 seconds. Each Sea-Dyed Foam can accumulate up to 30,000 HP (including overflow healing). There can be no more than one Sea-Dyed Foam active at any given time. This effect can still be triggered even when the character who is using this artifact set is not on the field.

pieces.name: Pearl Cage
pieces.desc: The shining pearls that the shrine maidens of Watatsumi Island offer up shine eternally and never dim.

pieces.name: Deep Palace's Plume
pieces.desc: A down feather with the same hue as coral, said to come from a shrine maiden's ceremonial garment.

pieces.name: Crown of Watatsumi
pieces.desc: An ancient, intricate crown that was once used by a forgotten clergy member. Today, this relic has been enshrined with great ceremony by the people of Watatsumi.

pieces.name: Sea-Dyed Blossom
pieces.desc: A soft flower that has taken on the many shades of the capricious ocean. It shines with wondrous colors under the moon's silver light.

pieces.name: Cowry of Parting
pieces.desc: A clean, flawless seashell that comes from the bottomless ocean.

pieces.name: Cowry of Parting
pieces.desc: A clean, flawless seashell that comes from the bottomless ocean.

bonuses.name: Vermillion Hereafter
bonuses.desc: After using an Elemental Burst, this character will gain the Nascent Light effect, increasing their ATK by 8% for 16s. When the character's HP decreases, their ATK will further increase by 10%. This further increase can occur this way a maximum of 4 times. This effect can be triggered once every 0.8s. Nascent Light will be dispelled when the character leaves the field. If an Elemental Burst is used again during the duration of Nascent Light, the original Nascent Light will be dispelled.

pieces.name: Moment of the Pact
pieces.desc: An old cup made of sand crystal. Its luster is somehow undimmed by age.

pieces.name: Feather of Nascent Light
pieces.desc: A dimly lustrous pinion steeped in strong memories.

pieces.name: Thundering Poise
pieces.desc: This mask is said to have been made by the mountain people for a Yaksha. It is of simple make, but its surface still shines brightly nonetheless.

pieces.name: Flowering Life
pieces.desc: An ancient memento. It still looks as alive as the being that preserved it several centuries ago.

pieces.name: Solar Relic
pieces.desc: An ancient timepiece with a mighty solid look. Its luster is produced by sand crystal.

pieces.name: Moment of the Pact
pieces.desc: An old cup made of sand crystal. Its luster is somehow undimmed by age.

pieces.name: Feather of Nascent Light
pieces.desc: A dimly lustrous pinion steeped in strong memories.

pieces.name: Thundering Poise
pieces.desc: This mask is said to have been made by the mountain people for a Yaksha. It is of simple make, but its surface still shines brightly nonetheless.

pieces.name: Flowering Life
pieces.desc: An ancient memento. It still looks as alive as the being that preserved it several centuries ago.

pieces.name: Solar Relic
pieces.desc: An ancient timepiece with a mighty solid look. Its luster is produced by sand crystal.

bonuses.name: Echoes of an Offering
bonuses.desc: When Normal Attacks hit opponents, there is a 36% chance that it will trigger Valley Rite, which will increase Normal Attack DMG by 70% of ATK. This effect will be dispelled 0.05s after a Normal Attack deals DMG. If a Normal Attack fails to trigger Valley Rite, the odds of it triggering the next time will increase by 20%. This trigger can occur once every 0.2s.

pieces.name: Chalice of the Font
pieces.desc: This teacup forever overflows with fresh water. Perhaps it was a gift from an adeptus, one of their relics, or just something they left behind.

pieces.name: Jade Leaf
pieces.desc: A jade ornament shaped like a leaf. It seems to have once had deep meaning between specific friends.

pieces.name: Flowing Rings
pieces.desc: A pair of earrings made from a single piece of jade. It has a most gentle texture.

pieces.name: Soulscent Bloom
pieces.desc: A jade carved into the shape of a flower. A phantom scent, here one instant and gone the next, swirls around it.

pieces.name: Symbol of Felicitation
pieces.desc: A circular jade ornament. Legend has it that it was once used somewhere as a symbol for rituals to begin.
